game.name: Frenzy Blood
game.categories: Single-player, Tracked Controller Support, VR Only, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Immerse in 1930s alternative America noir VR shooter! Become a traumatized bounty hunter on the trail of insane doctor. Battle puppet villains, use realistic weapons, leverage alcohol and tobacco in this gripping adventure.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Immerse in 1930s alternative America noir VR shooter! Become a traumatized bounty hunter on the trail of insane doctor. Battle puppet villains, use realistic weapons, leverage alcohol and tobacco in this gripping adventure.
